grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 嘲笑【チョウショウ】scorn, sneer
嘲罵【チョウバ】(verbal) abuse, insulting remark, taunt
自嘲【ジチョウ】self-deprecation, self-derision, self-mockery, laughing at oneself
kun reading compounds: 嘲る【あざける】to scoff, to laugh at, to make fun of, to ridicule, to jeer at
